article_title: Disney to Stream Frozen 2 Early Because the World's on Fire
article_description: The Mouse might have had a rocky start with its foray into the streaming world  but bringing Frozen 2 to Disney  early amid a national health emergency that has tons of people across the country cooped up inside is one hell of a power move  Read more
article_content: The Mouse might have had a rocky start with its foray into the streaming world  but bringing Frozen 2to Disney  early amid a national health emergency that has tons of people across the country cooped up inside is one hell of a power move In a press release   1451 chars
